summary: In this segment, the vehicle is driving on a city road. A gray sedan is parked on the right side of the road. Throughout the frames, a black car from the left lane moves into the self-vehicles lane, causing the self-vehicle to decelerate to avoid collision.
actions: The self-driving vehicle decelerates to avoid collision with the black car that is merging from the left lane into the self-vehicles lane. The vehicle maintains a safe distance from the gray sedan parked on the right side.
key_objects: 1) Left side: A black car, approximately 5 meters away, merging into the self-vehicles lane, causing the self-vehicle to decelerate. 2) Right side: A gray sedan, approximately 2 meters away, parked on the roadside.
